name: AIMS International Malaysia
description: AIMS International Malaysia is a Global leading provider of Retained Executive Search and Talent Management Services. We specialize in partnering with our clients to discover, assess and develop leaders to create competitive advantage and sustainable value for their businesses. We combine our global network across 50+ countries, deep local insights and sector expertise, and rigorous time-proven methodologies to create value for our clients, which include large corporations, multinationals, and public sector organizations.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: WE FIND&GROW YOUR LEADERS
ShortDescription: AIMS International Malaysia is a leading provider of Retained Executive Search and Talent Management Services.
enhanced_description: AIMS International Malaysia is a global leading provider specializing in Retained Executive Search and Talent Management Services. They partner with clients to discover, assess, and develop leaders, aiming to create competitive advantage and sustainable value for businesses. Their methodology combines a global network across 50+ countries with deep local insights and sector expertise, utilizing rigorous, time-proven approaches. AIMS International Malaysia primarily serves large corporations, multinational organizations, and public sector organizations, assisting them in hiring top talent faster and more efficiently, boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, and reducing the cost of hiring qualified employees.
competitive_advantages: Specialization in Retained Executive Search and Talent Management Services
roi_benefits: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
